description: This file sets up a playground environment with multiple agents (file upload, audio, video) for processing and answering questions about uploaded files, integrating various knowledge bases, models, and storage backends.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific roles, models, and storage configurations.

classes.name: CombinedKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Aggregates multiple knowledge sources into a single interface.

classes.name: CSVKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base sourced from CSV files.

classes.name: DocxKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base sourced from DOCX files.

classes.name: JSONKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base sourced from JSON files.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base sourced from PDF files.

classes.name: TextKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base sourced from text files.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Class to create and manage a playground environment for AI agents.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Retrieves the FastAPI app instance from the Playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Runs the playground server with specified app and reload option.
